Installation successful.

Suggested next steps.

Delete the project .git directory and initialise your own, setting an external origin.

Update the site meta-data in package.json so that it reflects your project.

Delete the contents of this file (index.html) ready for your own content.

Import your assets.

Customise your styles, installing a framework via npm if desired.

Identify which packages you do not need and remove using npm uninstall [package_name].
